title: DecodeableRpcInvocation增加入参类型校验
body:
## 目的

加固 关于CVE-2020-1948 的问题修复。

## 问题


通过简单的修改CVE-2020-1948的POC示例，我在dubbo-2.7.7中再次复现了该问题。

1. 使用 https://github.com/apache/dubbo-spring-boot-project 最新的2.7.7的TAG分支。
2. 其他poc内容参照：https://blog.csdn.net/caiqiiqi/article/details/106934770，但修改其中POC的部分代码：

```
    resp = client.send_request_and_return_response(
    service_name='org.apache.dubbo.spring.boot.demo.consumer.DemoService',
    method_name='rce',
    args=[toStringBean])
```

修改为

```
    resp = client.send_request_and_return_response(
    service_name='org.apache.dubbo.spring.boot.sample.consumer.DemoService',
    method_name='$invoke',
    service_version='1.0.0',
    args=[toStringBean])
```

注入的恶意代码ExploitMac.java依然会被执行。

## 提交内容

1. DecodeableRpcInvocation解码时，对$invoke、$invokeAsync、$echo等特殊方法进行参数描述的校验，防止外部输入不合法的参数类型。

Currently, some tests like the one in JavassistProxyFactoryTest fails if the RpcContext set by RpcContextTest.testAsync is not removed. Specifically, tests like JavassistProxyFactoryTest.testGetInvoker will see the following failure without the proposed fix (when JavassistProxyFactoryTest.testGetInvoker is run after RpcContextTest.testAsync).

```
JavassistProxyFactoryTest>AbstractProxyTest.testGetInvoker:68 expected: <java.lang.Object@294425a7> but was: <aa>
```

The proposed change is to have RpcContextTest.testAsync remove the RpcContext like RpcContextTest.testGetContext when it is done.

## Brief changelog

dubbo-rpc/dubbo-rpc-api/src/test/java/org/apache/dubbo/rpc/RpcContextTest.java

title: upgrade fastjson to 1.2.70
body:
https://help.aliyun.com/noticelist/articleid/1060343604.html?spm=a2c4g.789004748.n2.6.3f576141SGmGhG

# 漏洞描述

fastjson采用黑白名单的方法来防御反序列化漏洞，导致当黑客不断发掘新的反序列化Gadgets类时，在autoType关闭的情况下仍然可能可以绕过黑白名单防御机制，造成远程命令执行漏洞。经研究，该漏洞利用门槛较低，可绕过autoType限制，风险影响较大。阿里云应急响应中心提醒fastjson用户尽快采取安全措施阻止漏洞攻击。

# 影响版本

fastjson <=1.2.68

fastjson sec版本 <= sec9

# 安全版本

fastjson >=1.2.69

fastjson sec版本 >= sec10

title: Extended a new ExpressionRouter which can dynamically change the router
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Extended a real ExpressionRouter which can be the replacement of ConditionRouter which supports Java Expression Language(apache commons-jexl). 

Here's feature link submitted by me:
https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/6233


## Brief changelog

Added a new Router: ExpressionRouter and its factory class: ExpressionRouterFactory
To support its dynamic change, a new abstract ObserverRouter is introduced. This class should be an observer or listener, not observable or listenable. So it's better to correct the naming of ListenableRouter in later versions.
To evaluate the expression, a new extension ContextBuilder is introduced so that users can easily change the implement of the context. As default, DefaultContextBuilder will be used.
Several models are the mappings of the rules stored in config center.
At last, a new UT class is added and a new demo is introduced for quick start.

## Verifying this change

added a UT class and a new demo project.
I used nacos as the registry center and config center and it works perfect.
For demo project, please add following:
dataId: dubbo-demo-web-consumer.observer-router
group: dubbo
content:
dubbo-demo-annotation-provider:
  enabled: true
  defaultRuleEnabled: false
  rules:
    - clientCondition: true
      serverQuery: s.port == 20880
    - clientCondition: true
      serverQuery: true

Start up two provider instances which running on port 20880 and 200881.
Start up the web consumer on port 8088 and access the following url:
http://localhost:8088/hello/mars

The response will always be: Hello mars, response from provider: 192.168.1.5:20880

Ignore my local ip address, the PORT is the key point.

title: enhance LRUCache
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

update LRU to LRU-2

## Brief changelog

To reduce cache pollution, use history list to filter one access data. This strategy will not accupy too much extra memory because the history list only saves the keys.

When the data accessed for the first time, add it to history list. If the size of history list reaches max capacity, eliminate the earliest data. When the data already exists in the history list, and be accessed for the second time, then it will be put into cache.

## Verifying this change

Update LRUCacheTest and passed this test case, show as commit. The performance between LRU and LRU2 refer to https://blog.csdn.net/Victorgcx/article/details/104378378

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

- [x] Make sure there is a [GITHUB_issue](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues) field for the change (usually before you start working on it). title: fix ListenableRouter return own priority rather than DEFAULT_PRIORITY
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Fix ListenableRouter return own priority rather than DEFAULT_PRIORITY.
I see dubbo's  original intention is AppRouter should after ServiceRouter. AppRouter and ServiceRouter are all extend form ListenableRouter ,they have set their own priority ,but not override supper's method getPrioprity. So it will invoke supper's method when invoke getPrioprity. Supper's getPrioprity will return DEFAULT_PRIORITY(Integer.MAX_VALUE). This will make  AppRouter before ServiceRouter .

## Brief changelog

Fix ListenableRouter return own priority rather than DEFAULT_PRIORITY

`mvn package -Pdubbo-mini`

2. dubbo-core-spi, the SPI definition package.
`mvn package -Pdubbo-core-spi`

3. dubbo-all, the all-in-one package.
`mvn package -Pdubbo-all`

4. release, distribute all the above packages.
`mvn package -Prelease`

## Brief changelog

#6126 
the process logic of class FutureAdapter's callback is diferent from 2.6.x to 2.7.x.
maybe return a value object with response is better than return a Result object, but same code have different behavior is uncomfortable after update

在2.7和之前的dubbo版本里面，从FutureAdapter处获取ResponseFuture后的callback处理逻辑不一样。
也许直接返回值的处理更好，但是如果我们升级工程后运行，所有类似的调用全都会挂掉，必须得找出所有地方并改掉，这不合理。  

## Verifying this change

see unit test

见单元测试

title: [Dubbo-#6123] Fix genericservice compatible problem
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

fix genericservice compatible problem. (#6123)

从2.6.x升级到2.7.x时，低版本使用ReferencConfig初始化进行泛化调用的代码，会在获取实例时收到一个ClassCastException.

## Brief changelog

#6123 
when we use generic service initilized by ReferenceConfig, if we use setGeneric(true) and do not use setInterface(Class<?> interfaceClass), then the parameter invoker in createProxy will have interface org.apache.dubbo.rpc.service.GenericService.
then AbstractProxyFactory.getProxy will return a proxy without com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.service.GenericService, we will receive a error.

这个问题的原因是在ReferenceConfig初始化时，如果使用泛化调用，没有设置InterfaceClass并且setGeneric(true)，那么在createProxy的时候，invoker的class为org.apache.dubbo.rpc.service.GenericService。
那么在AbstractProxyFactory进行构建的时候，proxy的接口列表不会有com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.service.GenericService，获取实例时就会报错。

## Verifying this change

the unit test with GenericServiceTest#testGenericCompatible simulate normal generic service invoke, and it will fail before fix this bug.

单元测试里的GenericServiceTest#testGenericCompatible模拟了使用2.6.x代码进行普通泛化调用的场景，在修改前不会通过。

- [x] Write necessary unit-test to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add sample in [dubbo samples](https://github.com/apache/dubbo-samples) project.
- [x] Run `mvn clean install -DskipTests=false` & `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test` to make sure unit-test and integration-test pass.
